meanings.definition: Resembling an ape in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The costume at the party made him look apelike.
meanings.sent2: The zoo visitors were amazed by the apelike movements of the chimpanzee.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's apelike attempt to climb the tree brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her apelike agility on the basketball court earned her the nickname 'Monkey' from her teammates.
meanings.sent5: The apelike features of the ancient statue made it seem almost lifelike.
